episodes.title: When You're A Victim & A Misogynist | 'Inside America's Horrific Weight Loss Cult'
episodes.description:

2) Samantha: https://www.youtube.com/@samanthadragonetti

In this reaction and deconstruction, I respond to Drew Binsky’s documentary Inside America’s Horrific Weight Loss Cult, which explores the legacy of Gwen Shamblin and the damage her ideology caused. One of the most disturbing aspects is the interview with her son Michael. A man who is clearly a victim of the cult’s control and abuse, yet also expresses deeply anti-women beliefs. This video examines how victimhood does not automatically produce accountability, how patriarchal cult structures can harm men while still teaching them to dehumanize women, and why recognizing someone’s trauma does not require excusing the harm they perpetuate. Through a feminist and psychological lens, we unpack how coercive control, religious extremism, and misogyny can coexist and why that nuance matters.

#BrittanySimon #philosophy #cultpsychology #gwendshamblin #weightlosscult #religioustrauma #misogyny #patriarchy #feministanalysis #psychology #coercivecontrol #drewbinsky
